name: Leggett & Platt, Incorporated
description: Leggett & Platt, Incorporated is a diversified manufacturer that designs and produces a wide range of products that enhance the quality of life and support the operations of its customers. Founded in 1883 and headquartered in Carthage, Missouri, Leggett & Platt operates in various segments including Residential Products, Commercial Products, and Industrial Products. The company is best known for its innovative bedding products, including mattresses and mattress components, as well as its extensive line of furniture, flooring, and automotive products. Leggett & Platt is committed to sustainability and incorporates environmentally responsible practices in its manufacturing processes. The company’s core values focus on integrity, respect, and innovation, which drive its commitment to providing high-quality products and services. With over 140 facilities in 18 countries, Leggett & Platt serves a global customer base and continually invests in research and development to create new products and technologies that meet market demands. The company is dedicated to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace and emphasizes the importance of community engagement and social responsibility.
